text: Dada Thakur (2001) is a Bengali film, in which Ferdous Ahmed & Arpita Pal lead roles. ==Cast== * Ferdous Ahmed as Raja * Ranjit Mallick * Victor Banerjee * Arpita Pal * Laboni Sarkar * Anamika Saha as Raja's grandmother * Rajesh Sharma * Tota Roy Chowdhury * Subhasish Mukherjee == References == ==External links== * Dada Thakur (2001 film) at the Gomolo Category:2001 films Category:Bengali-language films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Bengali- language films
title: Dada Thakur (2001 film)
